backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining marketplace data types, persistent maps, and APIs for products, users, vendors, carts, orders, and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of many frontend files to short descriptive summaries used for build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Notes describing fixes for frontend production build issues related to Vite env vars, missing config files, and added TypeScript declarations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions configuring OKLCH color tokens and dark mode for the entire frontend.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app and setting PWA meta tags and manifest links.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and category settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and retry button shown when network requests fail.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache management, offline fallback handling, and selective caching for static assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root layout and defines all customer, vendor, and admin routes with role-based protection using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: React error boundary for admin pages that logs diagnostics and shows a styled fallback UI with copyable debug info.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with top and bottom navigation and a styled main container.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied UI with diagnostic details and options to refresh access or assign admin role.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to submit basic profile information and save it via hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access wrapper that checks user/admin/vendor roles and renders loading or denial screens accordingly.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar that adapts links based on user role and shows cart badge counts.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Styled wrapper around the Button component applying primary CTA gradient styles.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, pricing, discount, and an optional deal tag linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input component with floating label styling using peer-focus behavior.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Implements an auto-rotating banner slider with manual navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Shows a grid of product cards with pricing, availability, loading skeletons, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge displaying order status using helper functions to map style and label.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Provides the top navigation bar with search, role-aware actions, cart badge, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static list of sample vendor data including IDs, shop details, and contact numbers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes and injecting admin tokens when present.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Lightweight hook that reads and subscribes to the actor query state from the React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state handling. Wraps children with an auth provider using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, and other backend data using an actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom color variables for light and dark themes, along with utility styles and shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a styled About page describing the marketplace mission and features with icon-based highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin analytics with loading, error, and empty states plus charts and metric cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders for admins with status controls and updates via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and deleting products using dialog forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Manages vendor accounts, allowing admins to add or remove vendors through dialogs and actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page, handling quantity updates, removals, checkout navigation, and identity‑based access.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays product categories with loading skeletons, styled cards, and links to individual category pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays products for a selected category with sorting and filtering options using product and category queries.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items and submits an order after validating identity and cart contents.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with basic validation and simulated submission plus static contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer’s profile and identity details in read‑only form.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists a customer’s orders with basic order info and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays wishlist products with loading states, images, discounts, and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero slider, login buttons, featured deals, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Customer login form collecting personal and location details with validation and navigation to vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Vendor outlet details form with image upload, validation, and saving before navigating to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Displays vendor and outlet info after registration, showing location, contacts, and uploaded photo.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Shows vendors filtered by selected city with navigation to individual vendor shop pages.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Vendor login form collecting personal and location data with validation and redirect to outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays details for a specific vendor including location and contact, with fallback if vendor not found.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, image carousel, pricing, reviews, and supports adding to cart and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard showing stats, products, orders, wallet dues, and outlet status with ability to pay the company.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Displays vendor orders with status, timestamps, and details, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Manages vendor products, including adding, editing, and deleting items via dialogs and API mutations.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides deterministic gradient colors for categories based on hashed category IDs.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Finds a category by case‑insensitive name matching.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utilities to extract, format, and generate diagnostics text for user‑friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numbers or bigints into INR currency strings safely.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing customer, vendor, and outlet onboarding data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Safe conversion and formatting helpers for numbers and bigints, preventing crashes from invalid values.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to class names and labels, including stock availability styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite environment type definitions, including an optional VITE_II_URL env variable.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing an admin dashboard crash.
